about_the_game:
This Fantasy themed package can be used to create various Female Elf characters.
The output resolution of this pack is 639 x 968 pixels.

Content exclusive to this package:
- 60 base models
- 8 eyes
- 10 colorable makeup variations
- 31 pants
- 38 boots
- 62 tops
- 78 hair
- 44 colorable hair
- 35 fully made sets
- 45 special addons
- 50 weapon and armor pieces
- 7 token frames

Additional content available to all Season #1 Fantasy themed packs in the General category:
- 3+2 animals
- 16 backgrounds
- 3 frames

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows® XP
  • Processor: Intel® Pentium®4 1.5GHz
  • Memory: 512 MB RAM
  • Graphics: 1024 x 768 pixels
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows® 7 or better
  • Processor: Intel i3 @ 2GHz or better
  • Memory: 1 GB RAM
  • Graphics: 1920 x 1080 pixels or higher desktop resolution
